transcript:
Customer: Hello, vanakkam sir.
Executive: Sir, vanakkam sir, eppidi irukkinga sir? Good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning sir, enna matter sollunga sir.
Executive: Sir, sollunga sir.
Customer: Sir, namma side la customer care call pannirukkaru sir, enna issue sir?
Customer: Aama sir irukku sir.
Executive: Sir?
Customer: Irukku sir.
Executive: Enna achu sir, edhanala customer care ku call pannirunthinga sir? Naa enakku call pannunga sir, enna problem naalum solren appidinnu solli irundhen, enna achu sir?
Customer: Sir, unga cell number WhatsApp number sollunga call pannuren sir.
Executive: Sir, ore nimisham sir.
Customer: Sir, konjam sir, sir, naan edukka sir edukka sir, unga WhatsApp number sollunga sir.
Executive: Sir, ennoda number already unga kitta irukku sir.
Customer: Enna peru?
Executive: Saran, Saran.
Customer: Okay, Saran sir pesikkalaam.
Executive: Aama, aama sir, aama sir, enna achu sir, namma customer care ku call pannirukkingale, enna issue sir?
Customer: Paper plate eduthu mudiyama call panniruppen sir.
Executive: Aah, adhaan sir, adhudhaan, naan edhukkaaga naan ungalukku ketkurenaa, neenga en customer care ku neenga call panninga appidinnallum avanga call vandhu enakku dhaan forward panni viduvaanga. Enga irukkaravanga ellaarume paathinga appidinnna Hindi persons. Serigala?
Customer: Aama aama Hindi aama.
Executive: Ippo Tamil support ungalukku vandhu naan dhaan ungalukku kodukkuren.
Customer: Seri seri seri.
Executive: Aah, adhanaaladhaan naan enna solrenaa, ungalukku idhukku appuram paathinga appidinnna customer care ku call pannadhinga. Okay okay seri.
Executive: Idhukku appuram paathinga appidinnna naane ungalukku full support appidinnu naan kodukkuren, serigala? Seri.
Executive: Aah, enna avanga enna issue ketu solli irukkaanga appidinnna, neenga vandhu client ku support edhum pannala appidinnradhunaaladhaan engalukku call pannirukkaaru. So, immediately neenga connect pannunga appidinnu maari solli irundhaanga. Seri seri.
Executive: Neenga netthi kuppittirukkinga, actually netthi paathinga appidinnna namma side la netthi leave sir.
Customer: Aah aah.
Executive: Sunday. Neenga adhanaaladhaan naan ippo enna achu sir, enna ungalukku issue idhula?
Customer: Enna sir?
Executive: Enna problem naala neenga customer care ku call panniningannu ketkuren sir. Enna problem paper plate sammandhamaadhaan, order enakku varadhukkaaga dhaan call pannen sir.
Customer: Oh, naan adhudhaan ungalukku appave solli irundhen sir, namma side la first of all neenga adhukkaan leads neenga konjam proper aa edukka aarambichinganna ippo namma adhikkamaa eduthu eduthu paathinga appidinnna coconut kkum kopparaikkum dhaan namma leads adhikkamaa eduthukittu irukkom, adhanaaladhaan vandhu ungalukku adhikkamaa leads nariyaa varudhu. Serigala? Seri seri.
Executive: Ippo andha paper plate kku laam paathinga appidinnna neenga leads namma side la irundhu namma edukka aarambikkanum.
Customer: Seri sir konja neram kazhichu call pannalaamaa, oru oru pray kazhichu.
Executive: Sir illingga sir, naan unga kitta ippo oru five minutes pesinaa dhaan indha concern aa close panna mudiyum sir, adhanaaladhaan naan ippo ungalukku call pannen.
Customer: Seri seri.
Executive: Immediately, ennaa idhu, idhu actually paathinga appidinnna head office la irundhu vandhu irukkudhu appidinnrappa naan adhai immediately close panni aaganum. Seri seri.
Executive: So, adhukkaaga dhaan naan ungalukku ippo call pannadhu. Sir, adhudhaan sir, first of all paathinga appidinnna neenga adhikkamaa lead edukkardhu vandhu indha coconut kkum mundhirikkum dhaan neenga adhikkamaa lead eduthukittu irukkinga. Aama aama.
Executive: Ippo andha paper plate kku neenga lead adhikkamaa venum appidinnna namma enna pannannumnaa, oru naalukku edukkira rendu lead la oru lead vandhu indha coconut la irundhum inna oru lead vandhu indha paper plate la irundhu neenga lead edukka aarambichingannaa dhaan ungalukku proper aa andha location ku andha category ku vandhu ungalukku leads vara aarambikkum, serigala? Seri sir.
Executive: Adhukku apparamaa, adhai eduthadhume paathinga appidinnna,
Executive: Naan solradhu ungalukku ennaa appidinnu naan solringa correct aa?
Customer: Aah, hello.
Executive: Sollunga sir sollunga sir. Tamil Nadu mattum dhaan namma focus pannurom appidinnradhunaala Tamil Nadu locations la irundhu ippo neenga unga lead edukka aarambinga. Adhai ippo naan solradhu basis la adhaavadhu oru naalukku rendu lead edukkardhula oru lead vandhu, like andha coconut andha cashew indha category la irundhu oru lead vandhu andha paper plate related category la irundhu neenga lead edukka aarambichingaa appidinnrappa, neenga proper aa vandhu andha category la irundhu ungalukku lead proper aa vara aarambikkum appidinnrappa neenga indha issue vandhu ungalukku varaadhu, neenga solringa enakku lead indhula varala appidinnradhu maari solringalaa? So, indha issue ndradhu ungalukku varaadhu. Adhai naan solradhu maari edukka aarambichingannaa, indha two is one is to one adhaavadhu idhula onnu idhula onnu neenga edukkirappa renduththoda balancing um ungalukku proper aa irukkum. Aah, indha issue varaadhu, idhukku apparamaa paathinga appidinnna neenga, indha maari edhum issues irundhuchu appidinnna neenga ennoda number naan ungalukku text pannuren, neenga enakku call pannunga sir. Okay sir okay sir.
Executive: Enna enakku neenga call panninga naan ungalukku support kodukka mudiyadhinga, naan customer care ku kuppudringannu appidinnrappa ungalukku Hindi dhaan Hindi support dhaan kidaikkum, Tamil support appidinnradhu paathinga appidinnna ennoda side la irundhu dhaan ungalukku naan kodukka mudiyum. Seri seringga. So, adhukkaaga dhaan naan solren neenga idhukku appuram enakku call pannunga, idhukku appuram paathinga appidinnna ungalukku endha doubt irundhu neenga call pannave naan edukala appidinnna enakku just neenga WhatsApp la kooda text panni vidunga naan ennaannu ungalukku andha issue naan paarkkuren, serigala? Seri sir seri sir.
Executive: Seri ippo naan concern naan close panniralaamaa illa eppidi sir? Sir konjam, sir idhu seri illa sir.
Executive: Illa sir indha, idhu actually neenga raise pannirundha concern naan ippo close pannirukkingalaa appidinnu ketkuren ungalukku, satisfy dhaan ippo naan sonnadhu ungalukku okay vaa dhaan irukkudhu, eppidi irundhaalum ungalukku call panna solli irukken avlodhaane? Aama aama.
Executive: Seri doubt irundha seri seri seri seri okay sir, seri ippo unga field naan close pannadhukku apparamaa vandhu ungalukku oru mail varum, serigala? Seri aah.
Executive: So, adhanaa adhukku konjam yes mattum kodunga, serigala? Okay okay sir okay sir.
Executive: Okay sir thank you sir thank you thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer called customer care for order issue.

- Wants leads for paper plates.



Resolution:

- Executive explained lead generation process.

- Suggested to take leads from different categories.

- Provided his direct contact number for support.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will close the concern.

- Customer will receive a confirmation email.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, customer care, support, paper plate
